lesson.title: The Power of Consistent Participation
lesson.objective: Learn how regular engagement compounds benefits

sections.content: Showing up once is easy. Showing up repeatedly demonstrates commitment. Many protocols reward consistency - daily check-ins, regular claims, ongoing participation. It's not about size, it's about reliability.
Consistent engagement builds habits. By returning across 3 separate days, you're developing the rhythm of an active DeFi participant. This muscle memory compounds into expertise over time.

content: Small, consistent actions compound over time

questions.question: Why do protocols reward consistent participation?
options: Because reliable users are more valuable
To make the protocol seem busier

questions.question: What compounds more effectively over time?

unlockHint: Interact with the protocol across 3 separate days
nextSteps: You've proven you can show up consistently.
This habit will serve you throughout your DeFi journey.
